ender_pad.desc: Place another in the path of the arrow on top and sneak while standing on one to teleport to the other
item.assisted_progression.climbing_glove: Have in your inventory to scale walls by walking into them
item.assisted_progression.electric_magne: Attracts item entities and xp orbs, requires power. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
item.assisted_progression.hefty_bag.desc: Contains 18 slots, will void items matching filter on pickup
item.assisted_progression.magnet.desc: Attracts all sorts of things, some dangerous. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
item.assisted_progression.pipette.desc: Holds up to one bucket of fluid, useful for removing fluid amounts less than one bucket. Right click fluid handling tiles to insert and extract fluid
item.assisted_progression.trash_bag.desc: Contains one slot, will void items matching filter on pickup
player_player.desc: Pressure plate that will only activate for player entities
sun.desc: Place above plants to help them grow. Will service a radius of 3 blocks around and 3 blocks below
